    • Method Detail

      • hasOperation

        default boolean hasOperation()
        Returns:
        true of an operation is set.

      • getOperation

        String getOperation()
        Returns:
        the querybuilder predication operation (equals, not equals, exists)

      • hasAnd

        boolean hasAnd()
        Returns:
        true if the predicate's "and" operation is set.

      • getAnd

        Boolean getAnd()
        This is typically preceded by hasAnd() since if the and operation is NOT set, then this will return false.
        Returns:
        the value of the and operation.

      • getItems

        Returns:
        the option items for this predicate.

        Returns:

      • getSubType

        String getSubType()
        Returns:
        the configured sub-type (checkbox, toggle, slider, radio buttons)

      • getProperty

        String getProperty()
        Returns:
        the relative property path used for this predicate.

      • getValuesKey

        String getValuesKey()
        Returns:
        the predicate's key that indicates the predicates values.
